profile.title: Profile
profile.text:
With more than 4 years of experience as a full-stack web developer and consultant, I have developed extensive expertise in both front-end and back-end development, as well as advising clients on technical solutions.
I enjoy applying my technical knowledge and soft skills to work on long-term projects and to further optimize the quality of a product. Additionally, I am motivated to continue developing myself and am open to taking up additional training to broaden my skills and take on a wider range of technical or administrative responsibilities.

solidaris.description: Analysis and implementation of new internal applicaties, as well as migration of existing ones, in .NET and Angular.

appFoundry.description: Development and maintenance of TypeScript/Javascript based applications, both in-house and for AppFoundry's clients, primarily web applications, developed in React/Next.js, but also mobile apps, developed in React Native + Participate in and contribute to technical analyses.

alpine.description: Participate in the analysis and implementation of Belgian Cycling Factory's store front website.
